attributes.action: Ask everyone to provide their national insurance either on the National Census Form to be completed in 2011 or on an accompanying form to be issued with the Census form
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I understand that there are approx 100 million nat.ins.numbers in circulation and I suspect that many of them are being utilizes to submit fraudulant claims. A recent TV programme exposed a couple that had claimed under 154 different names and been paid £1.8 million.Providing such information would enable the DHSS to prepare a fresh data base of claimants and eliminate many fraudulant claims
